snippet.title: Tears of Magic - Kickstarter Launched!
snippet.description:
Fund Tears of Magic NOW!

We are creating a spiritual successor to #BreathofFire. Embark on this adventure with us today!

🐲 Play as a dragon
🔥 Customize your own story
😺 Enjoy a beautiful fantasy 2.5D world in pixel art

Link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/goodoldpixel/tears-of-magic
